title: Data Platform Modernization & Migration
impact: Modernized data infrastructure at massive scale and enabled advanced analytics
description: Leading enterprise-scale data migration from SQL Server to Snowflake, processing datasets exceeding 50TB and trillions of rows including complex skeletal tracking data. Architecting and orchestrating automated ingestion from S3 using Dagster, applying environment-aware logic and reusable dbt macros, implementing layered modeling (staging, fact, intermediate, base, constants) to deliver analytics-ready datasets, building data visualizations, and replicating curated data back to SQL Server using Sling for downstream applications.

title: Enterprise Identity & Access Management Platform
impact: Established secure, scalable authentication and authorization for enterprise customer platforms
description: Led implementation of enterprise IAM infrastructure using PingFederate and Ping Identity to provide centralized authentication, MFA, and SSO across customer-facing platforms. Coordinated penetration testing engagements, triaged findings, and implemented security hardening recommendations. Established identity governance controls, session management policies, and security monitoring to protect customer data and ensure compliance.

title: Engineering Transparency & Delivery Platform
impact: Improved visibility, portfolio governance, and delivery accountability
description: Standardized Jira and Azure DevOps taxonomies to unify reporting across teams. Delivered KPI dashboards with throughput, velocity, and SLA metrics, enabling traceability from strategic themes to work items. Established governance framework for portfolio prioritization, capacity planning, and ROI tracking across engineering organization.

title: CRM & Revenue Lifecycle Modernization
impact: Standardized revenue processes, improved data security, and enhanced conversion insights
description: Unified Salesforce, Dynamics, and ServiceNow into a single CRM and sales platform post-M&A. Automated Lead → Opportunity → Quote workflows with embedded guardrails, data validation, and access controls. Established data governance policies, customer data protection standards, and surfaced pipeline performance through secure dashboards.

title: SEGRA360 – Unified Customer Portal
impact: Reduced customer support volume by 40% through self-service
description: Directed the 0-to-1 launch of SEGRA360, a secure self-service portal integrating billing, orders, service status, and usage across multiple back-office systems. Embedded analytics to track customer engagement, identify feature adoption patterns, and inform product roadmap decisions. Delivered full-stack platform from architecture through production deployment.

title: SEGRAmaps – Data Visualization Platform
description: Developed SEGRAmaps, a geospatial visualization system integrated with CRM. Enabled faster network qualification and pricing decisions through interactive maps and workflow integration.

title: Cloud & Platform Migrations
impact: Improved scalability, security posture, and operational agility of enterprise systems
description: Led modernization programs including Dynamics 365 CRM migration to Azure and portal replatforming to ServiceNow. Refactored legacy code, integrated serverless services with security controls, implemented encryption at rest and in transit, and enabled Power Apps adoption with governance policies. Ensured compliance with security standards throughout migration lifecycle.

title: Workflow & Contract Automation
impact: Reduced approval and contract cycle times
description: Implemented workflow engines with embedded economics guardrails, automated contract generation, and integrated e-signature. Reduced policy drift and accelerated execution while improving compliance.

title: Location Validation & Data Quality Services
impact: Enhanced data quality, governance, and eliminated duplicates
description: Built validation services integrating Dynamics, ESRI, and MuleSoft to improve address accuracy, prevent duplication, and enable accurate network site modeling. Established data quality rules, validation workflows, and governance controls to ensure data integrity across enterprise systems.

title: Business Proposal Platform
impact: Accelerated proposal generation and improved consistency
description: Created a branded proposal generation system with automated document assembly. Reduced manual coordination between marketing and sales and improved turnaround speed.

title: Interactive Resume / Portfolio Site
description: Built a personal portfolio site with React/Vite, featuring SEO metadata, dark mode, filtered project views, and a print-optimized layout. Deployed via GitHub Pages with automated CI/CD pipelines.

title: facet – AI-Powered Portfolio Builder
impact: Live SaaS platform enabling rapid creation of professional digital portfolios using conversational AI
description: Built and launched facet, an AI-powered portfolio builder that uses conversational AI to generate professional digital portfolios. Developed end-to-end product from concept through production deployment, including Stripe-based monetization, webhook persistence, and automated testing. Pitched at University of South Carolina's Boyd Innovation Center and currently operating as a live SaaS platform with production-grade reliability through CI/CD and containerized deployment.

title: Automated Testing Framework
impact: Improved reliability of feature rollouts through regression testing
description: Implemented a Selenium-based end-to-end regression test suite. Integrated tests into Azure DevOps pipelines to validate new features and prevent regressions during releases.
